name: 100 Gates
description:
Introducing the most addictive "Room Escape" game for Android.

Advance to the next castle room by solving the puzzle!

Characteristics:

  • The best door exit game available for android

  • Completely free

  • Full use of the resources that your devices!

  • Addicting mini puzzles!

  • Gorgeous graphics and sound

  • Balanced difficulty level from very easy to very hard

How to play

  • Unlock the current door to get the next level

  • Each level has a different puzzle to be solved

  • Use any way possible to unlock: Drag, Shake, Tap the Ground, One Tap, Tilt, Buttons and so on

  • Many different items available

Remember that in some rooms on the first floor you have to complete the heist in order to open the doors and advance in the game.

Just try it. You'll love!
